text.name: sys_description
text.text: From 1996 to 2020 Flash made it possible to run animations and video games on web browsers. These represent an era, being mostly free, they were easily accessible to everyone and we participated in the democratization of video games. The majority are creations of individuals, many are of poor quality, some pose licensing problems. But the video game has a history and they are part of it, it's about keeping track of it. The situation is similar to that of Abandonware.
